Name: BANISHING SMITE
Description: The next time you hit acreature with aweapon attackbefore this spell ends, your weapon crackles with force,and the attack deals an extra 5dlO force damage tothetarget. Additionally, ifthis attack reduces the targetto50 hit points or fewer, you banish it.Ifthe target isnative toadifferent plane ofexistence than the oneyou're on, the target disappears, returning toits homeplane. ]fthe target isnative tothe plane you're on, thecreature vanishes into aharmless demiplane. Whilethere, the target is incapacitated. Itremains there untilthe spell ends, at which point the target reappears in thespace itleftor in the nearest unoccupied space ifthatspace isoccupied.
